metadata.synopsis: This Swedish film follows Erik (Jonas Rimeika) as he attempts to locate his recently vanished sister Sussie (Tuva Novotny). His search brings Erik back to the small town of his youth. There, he reunites with an old friend (Johan Andersson), but quickly realizes that he'll get no help in his search from the lazy local police officer (Kjell Bergqvist). In the process of looking for Sussie, Erik encounters thugs, drug dealers and many other deadbeats.

reviews: Slim Susie makes the case that imitation is not only flattery, but the most effective language of postmodern cinema.
No Scandanavian Dogme doom and gloom here
